tool_description:
Cyprus Gas Prices

	                        Unlead 95	Unlead 98	Diesel heat	Diesel auto	Kerosene
petroleum_type	1	                2	                3	                4	                5
name: CyGaz
title: CyGaz

api_list.name: Get Gas Pricing
api_list.description:
This wil fetch all the stations for whole Cyprus

petroleum_type can have the following allowed values


|                    | Unlead 95 | Unlead 98 | Diesel heat | Diesel auto | Kerosene |
|--------------------|-----------|-----------|-------------|-------------|----------|
| **petroleum_type** | 1         | 2         | 3           | 4           | 5        |

---
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cygaz.p.rapidapi.com/prices/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cygaz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cygaz.p.rapidapi.com/prices/{petroleum_type}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cygaz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get API version
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cygaz.p.rapidapi.com/version"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cygaz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
